text: Victor Alexeevich Zubkov (; born 15 September 1941) is a Russian politician and businessman. He served as the Prime Minister of Russia twice: from September 2007 to May 2008. He was Vladimir Putin's First Deputy Prime Minister during the Presidency of Dmitri Medvedev. Zubkov was born in Sverdlovsk Oblast. ==Other websites== * Biography by Vladimir Pribylovsky Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Russia Category:Politicians from Sverdlovsk Oblast
title: Viktor Zubkov
